dialogue.introduction: Kagerou-class Destroyer, Nowaki, reporting in. Well, Commander. Let us proceed.
dialogue.library_intro: Kagerou-class destroyer number 15, Nowaki. Born in Maizuru. I was with Maikaze in the 4th DesDiv. At the start of the war, I participated in the Southern Operation in the 4th Torpedo Squadron under Naka-san, as well as Midway, Mariana, and Leyte. I will do my best with whatever I can.
dialogue.secretary2: Hm? Commander, do you have a request?
dialogue.secretary3: Maikaze, stop it... Commander? ...What is the meaning of this?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Maikaze, what are you up to...? Are you well...? Ah, Commander! I'm alright! Nowaki, on standby!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander, are you perhaps tired?... don't overwork yourself, please, take a rest.
dialogue.wedding: Commander, what is it? Maikaze is waiting so I have to go back... eh?... this is... uhm... I have to report to Naka-san... eh?... it is not needed?
dialogue.equipment1: This is good... With this, I feel like I can keep going.
dialogue.supply: Thank goodness... Now I can fight.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Just let me... rest a bit.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'm sorry... As soon as I've recovered, I'll return to the front.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned. Good work.
dialogue.night_battle: We'll do it! All ships, attack!
dialogue.mvp: Haa... Thank goodness. That's right, Maikaze. This is the strength of the 4th DesDiv!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: They got me... I-I can still move. I won't... sink yet!
dialogue.sunk: No good... I'm sinking... Chikuma-san... I'm sorry... I... hh...
dialogue.christmas_2014: "Christmas"? This is...this is cake? *Om noms* It's sweet and delicious.
dialogue.new_year_2015: Happy New Year, Commander. You took great care of me last year. I will be in your care again this year.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Oh?! So today is a special day!? Good for you, Command.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: In Setsubun, is it better to throw the beans or eat them? Eh? You do both?

hourly.0000: Commander, Nowaki will be serving as your secretary ship for today. I will be in your care.
hourly.0100: 0100. Commander, it is the late night.
hourly.0200: 0200. Commander, it is now the hour of ushimitsu.
hourly.0300: 0300. Commander, you're not tired? How impressive!
hourly.0400: 0400. Commander, are you even understanding the meaning of my words? Wow, very impressive!
hourly.0500: 0500. It's morning. We should prepare to wake everyone else soon.
hourly.0600: 0600. Morning. Nowaki shall begin preparations for breakfast.
hourly.0700: 07...00. Ah, excuse me, I got engrossed in preparing breakfast... Today is a Japanese breakfast. Please, help yourself.
hourly.0800: 0800. How did you like my breakfast? Ah, is that so, excellent.
hourly.0900: 0900. Soon, our Fourth Destroyer Squadron will sortie in full force as well. Commander, your orders!
hourly.1000: 1000. Maikaze, dancing around all the time like that is dangerous... Ah, Commander, I'm sorry!
hourly.1100: 1100. Commander, it will be noon soon. What will you have? Nowaki will follow your orders.
hourly.1200: 1200... Ah, Akagi-san. And to what do we owe the plea- Eh? Lunch? Y, yes! Help yourself!
hourly.1300: 1300. That surprised me back then. Excuse me... No, I'm fine.
hourly.1400: 1400. Well, let's do our best with the afternoon's missions too. Commander, what's next?
hourly.1500: 1500. Maikaze, I'm sorry, I'm working right now... Haah, it can't be helped... Jeez.
hourly.1600: 1600. Commander, excuse me. I'll be fine. It won't have any effect on the fleet's duties.
hourly.1700: 1700. Soon the sun will fall, huh. Commander, the setting sun... is a bit sad, huh.
hourly.1800: 1800. I will handle the preparations for dinner. How would steak be, every once in a while?
hourly.1900: 1900. I tried a little harder at dinner. Commander, how is the taste?
hourly.2000: 2000. Commander, it's best to exercise a little after dinner, exercise.
hourly.2100: 21... Ah, Tone-san, Chikuma-san! Chikuma-san, I'm perfectly fine.
hourly.2200: 2200. Commander, it's a quiet night. It would be nice if all nights could be like this, huh.
hourly.2300: 2300. Commander, thank you very much for today's hard work. Nowaki will try her best tomorrow as well!
